dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: British diplomas in Kazakhstan, that's a game-changer for higher education there.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: British diplomas in Kazakhstan, that's a game-changer for higher education there.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The university will offer MBA Global Business and Bachelors degree programs, and upon completion of these programs, a British diploma will be issued.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Right? And it's Coventry University offering them. They're bringing their top-ranked programs, like business management and computer science.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right? And it's Coventry University offering them. They're bringing their top-ranked programs, like business management and computer science.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Bachelors degree programs at Coventry University for Kazakhstan will cover disciplines in which the university holds leading positions in world rankings. These include business and human resource management, pedagogy, computer science, information technology management, advertising, digital marketing, and others.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And they're not just stopping at undergrad and MBA programs. They've got this international teaching certificate too, developed by NITE in the UK.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And they're not just stopping at undergrad and M B A programs. They've got this international teaching certificate too, developed by N I T E in the U K.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The program was developed by the National Institute of Teaching and Education in the United Kingdom (NITE) and is accredited by the Department of Education in England.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, for teachers and school leaders, that's huge. The British Ambassador, Kathy Leach, called it timely given the growing demand for qualified teachers.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, for teachers and school leaders, that's huge. The British Ambassador, Kathy Leach, called it timely given the growing demand for qualified teachers.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In an era when the demand for qualified teachers is constantly growing, such programs are timely and necessary for the development of education in Kazakhstan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, she really emphasized the commitment to talent development in Kazakhstan. And the cost aspect is interesting—studying locally is way more affordable than going abroad.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, she really emphasized the commitment to talent development in Kazakhstan. And the cost aspect is interesting-studying locally is way more affordable than going abroad.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: It should be noted that studying in Kazakhstan will be much more affordable compared to the cost of education abroad, considering the cost of flight and accommodation.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Plus, they're offering grants for academic high-achievers and those with sports or arts prizes. Craig Blyth mentioned their global network spans from China to Dubai.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Plus, they're offering grants for academic high-achievers and those with sports or arts prizes. Craig Blyth mentioned their global network spans from China to Dubai.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: University grants will be awarded on a competitive basis to applicants with outstanding academic results, as well as achievements in sports, art, and other fields, confirmed by prize-winning places in Olympiads and competitions.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: He also stressed that the education quality in Kazakhstan will be identical to the UK campuses. Same opportunities, same tech access—even simulators for practical experience.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: He also stressed that the education quality in Kazakhstan will be identical to the U K campuses. Same opportunities, same tech access-even simulators for practical experience.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Our students in Kazakhstan will have the same benefits and opportunities as other campuses abroad. We provide access to all technologies, and many of our students get their first experience in simulators.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: It's a partnership with Primus Education, right? Aligning with Kazakhstan's goal to modernize its education system.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's a partnership with Primus Education, right? Aligning with Kazakhstan's goal to modernize its education system.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In Kazakhstan, the Coventry University campus project is being implemented with the support of Primus Education, which is investing in the future of education, aligning with Kazakhstans goal of modernizing its education system.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. And this isn't their first move there—they already opened a British school in Almaty too.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. And this isn't their first move there-they already opened a British school in Almaty too.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Earlier, they announced the opening of Ardingly Astana, a British school in Astana.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Coventry's been around since 1843, and they're ranked among the best for teaching and innovation. Times Higher Education recognizes them as one of the most modern unis.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Coventry's been around since eighteen forty three, and they're ranked among the best for teaching and innovation. Times Higher Education recognizes them as one of the most modern unis.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Coventry University, founded in 1843, is ranked among the worlds leading institutions of higher education by many indicators, including the quality of teaching, the best student experience, the level of interaction with students, and satisfaction in the field of business and management. It is recognized as one of the most innovative modern universities, according to Times Higher Education.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: So students in Kazakhstan get that legacy without the travel costs. It's a pretty smart setup.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So students in Kazakhstan get that legacy without the travel costs. It's a pretty smart setup.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. And the chance to connect with students globally remotely? That's a nice touch for building international networks.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. And the chance to connect with students globally remotely? That's a nice touch for building international networks.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: We help students connect with their classmates around the world. Therefore, you will have the opportunity to communicate with students from other countries remotely, said Craig Blyth, Coventry University Global Engagement Representative.

artist_script:
HostA: British diplomas in Kazakhstan, that's a game-changer for higher education there.
HostB: Right? And it's Coventry University offering them. They're bringing their top-ranked programs, like business management and computer science.
HostA: And they're not just stopping at undergrad and MBA programs. They've got this international teaching certificate too, developed by NITE in the UK.
HostB: Oh, for teachers and school leaders, that's huge. The British Ambassador, Kathy Leach, called it timely given the growing demand for qualified teachers.
HostA: Yeah, she really emphasized the commitment to talent development in Kazakhstan. And the cost aspect is interesting—studying locally is way more affordable than going abroad.
HostB: Plus, they're offering grants for academic high-achievers and those with sports or arts prizes. Craig Blyth mentioned their global network spans from China to Dubai.
HostA: He also stressed that the education quality in Kazakhstan will be identical to the UK campuses. Same opportunities, same tech access—even simulators for practical experience.
HostB: It's a partnership with Primus Education, right? Aligning with Kazakhstan's goal to modernize its education system.
HostA: Exactly. And this isn't their first move there—they already opened a British school in Almaty too.
HostB: Coventry's been around since 1843, and they're ranked among the best for teaching and innovation. Times Higher Education recognizes them as one of the most modern unis.
HostA: So students in Kazakhstan get that legacy without the travel costs. It's a pretty smart setup.
HostB: Absolutely. And the chance to connect with students globally remotely? That's a nice touch for building international networks.
